Login

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', }) export class LoginComponent { email: string = ''; password: string = ''; showPassword: boolean = false; togglePasswordVisibility(): void { this.showPassword = !this.showPassword; } login(): void { // Add your login logic here console.log('Login button clicked'); } }
